messages.content: are all the angles equal in a parallelogram
No, in a parallelogram, angles aren't equal; opposite angles are equal instead.
is an oz and a fl oz the same
No, an oz is a unit of weight, while a fl oz is a unit of volume.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel isn't part of the European Economic Area.
is in n out only located in california
No, In-N-Out also has locations in Arizona, Nevada, Oregon, Utah, and Texas.
is a wheel and axle a simple machine
Indeed, a wheel and axle is classified as a simple machine!
is aldi the largest grocer in the world
No, but it’s major in Europe and expanding elsewhere, offering only store brands.
can you turn right on a red in quebec
yes only if there's a sign allowing it otherwise it's prohibited in quebec
can you play just cause 3 on xbox 360
no, it's only available on xbox one, ps4, and pc
is there a part two to advengers infinity war
Yes, "Avengers: Endgame" is the follow-up to "Avengers: Infinity War".
is the isle of man part of the european economic area
no, it isn’t part of the european economic area, but its companies can apply for EEA authorization.
